text: Tomara to allahara paribarte kebala pratimara'i puja karacha ebam mithya udbhabana karacha. Tomara allahara paribarte yadera ebadata karacha, tara tomadera riyikera malika naya. Kaje'i allahara kache riyika talasa kara, tamra ebadata kara ebam tamra krtajnata prakasa kara. Tamra'i kache tomara pratyabartita habe.
